info.name: Project AI - Job Post Generator
info.description: API endpoints for generating professional job posts using AI with specific formatting rules and character limits

item.name: Local

request.description: Generate a job post with only the required freeText parameter - the project description (minimal example)

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Subtle marketing",
  "freeText": "פרויקט פיתוח מערכת חכמה לניהול IoT במפעל ייצור",
  "jobRole": "מפתח/ת תוכנה - פיתוח קושחה",
  "jobType": "פרויקט",
  "yearsExp": "1-2",
  "mustSkills": "C, C++, embedded systems, RTOS",
  "niceSkills": "Bluetooth, CAN, OTA updates"
}

request.description: Generate a Hebrew job post for a firmware developer project with 1-2 years experience

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Friendly and encouraging",
  "freeText": "הצטרף/י לצוות הפיתוח שלנו",
  "jobRole": "מפתח/ת Frontend",
  "jobType": "משרה מלאה",
  "yearsExp": "0",
  "mustSkills": "React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS",
  "niceSkills": "TypeScript, Next.js, Redux"
}

request.description: Generate a Hebrew job post for an entry-level Frontend developer position

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Professional",
  "freeText": "הזדמנות ייחודית לעבוד עם טכנולוגיות מתקדמות",
  "jobRole": "Backend Developer",
  "jobType": "משרה מלאה",
  "yearsExp": "2-3",
  "mustSkills": "Node.js, MongoDB, Express, REST APIs",
  "niceSkills": "Docker, Redis, Microservices, AWS"
}

request.description: Generate a Hebrew job post for a Backend developer position with 2-3 years experience

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Professional",

  "jobRole": "VP Engineering",
  "jobType": "משרה מלאה",
  "yearsExp": "3+",
  "mustSkills": "Team management, Architecture, Node.js, React",
  "niceSkills": "AWS, Kubernetes, Microservices"
}

request.description: Generate a Hebrew job post for a VP Engineering position

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "English",
  "writingStyle": "Professional",
  "freeText": "Temporary position for smart development project",
  "jobRole": "Software Developer - Firmware Development",
  "jobType": "Full time",
  "yearsExp": "1-2",
  "mustSkills": "C, C++, embedded systems, RTOS",
  "niceSkills": "Bluetooth, CAN, OTA updates"
}

request.description: Generate an English job post for a Software Developer position

item.name: Project AI - With Custom Character Limits

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Professional",
  "freeText": "הצטרף/י לחברה מובילה",
  "jobRole": "Full Stack Developer",
  "jobType": "משרה מלאה",
  "yearsExp": "2-3",
  "mustSkills": "React, Node.js, MongoDB",
  "niceSkills": "TypeScript, AWS",
  "charCountLimits": {
    "title": 150,
    "description": 250,
    "requirements": 200
  }
}

request.description: Generate a job post with custom character limits for each section (title: 150, description: 250, requirements: 200)

item.description: Local development endpoints running on localhost:5000

request.description: Minimal example - only freeText required (project description). AI will generate title, description, and requirements using default character limits (Production)

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Subtle marketing",
  "freeText": "פרויקט פיתוח מערכת חכמה לניהול IoT במפעל ייצור",
  "jobRole": "מפתח/ת תוכנה - פיתוח קושחה",
  "jobType": "פרויקט",
  "yearsExp": "1-2",
  "mustSkills": "C, C++, embedded systems, RTOS",
  "niceSkills": "Bluetooth, CAN, OTA updates"
}

item.name: Project AI - With Custom Character Limits (Live)

body.raw:
{
  "lang": "עברית",
  "writingStyle": "Professional",
  "freeText": "הצטרף/י לחברה מובילה",
  "jobRole": "Full Stack Developer",
  "jobType": "משרה מלאה",
  "yearsExp": "2-3",
  "mustSkills": "React, Node.js, MongoDB",
  "niceSkills": "TypeScript, AWS",
  "charCountLimits": {
    "title": 100,
    "description": 200,
    "requirements": 180
  }
}

request.description: Generate a job post with custom character limits (Production) - title: 100, description: 200, requirements: 180
